Class TriangleVertexRenderComponent

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, SimpleDrawAble, org.jgraph.graph.CellViewRenderer
public class TriangleVertexRenderComponent
extends DefaultVertexRenderComponent

This class extends the class VertexRender in the JGraph components to be a vertex render for triangle vertex type.

Author:
kjellw

Method Detail

getRendererComponent

public java.awt.Component getRendererComponent(org.jgraph.JGraph graph,
                                               org.jgraph.graph.CellView view,
                                               boolean sel,
                                               boolean focus,
                                               boolean preview)
Description copied from class: org.jgraph.graph.VertexRenderer
Configure and return the renderer component based on the passed in cell. The value is typically set from messaging the graph with convertValueToString. We recommend you check the value's class and throw an illegal argument exception if it's not correct.

Specified by:
getRendererComponent in interface org.jgraph.graph.CellViewRenderer
Overrides:
getRendererComponent in class DefaultVertexRenderComponent
Parameters:
graph - the graph that that defines the rendering context.
view - the cell view that should be rendered.
sel - whether the object is selected.
focus - whether the object has the focus.
preview - whether we are drawing a preview.
Returns:
the component used to render the value.

getPerimeterPoint

public java.awt.geom.Point2D getPerimeterPoint(org.jgraph.graph.VertexView view,
                                               java.awt.geom.Point2D source,
                                               java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
Description copied from class: org.jgraph.graph.VertexRenderer
Returns the intersection of the bounding rectangle and the straight line between the source and the specified point p. The specified point is expected not to intersect the bounds.

Overrides:
getPerimeterPoint in class org.jgraph.graph.VertexRenderer
